long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join Thousands of Users Who Use Listen On Repeat Every Day!
Looking for the easiest way to loop YouTube videos? The Listen On Repeat YouTube Looper is the fastest and most convenient solution! With just one click, you can automatically loop any YouTube video without ever needing to press replay.

Why Choose Listen On Repeat?
	•	#1 Platform for Repeating YouTube Videos: Listenonrepeat.com is the leading site worldwide for looping YouTube videos, providing more than just a repeat button.
	•	Custom Playlists & Music Discovery: Create your own playlists, discover new music weekly, and explore daily reviews of trending songs and artists.
	•	Advanced Features: Set custom start and stop times for videos, enjoy music blog content, and access exclusive podcasts and radio.
	•	Seamless Integration: No need to manually replace “youtube.com” with “listenonrepeat.com.” Simply click the extension button while watching any video on YouTube, and it will automatically loop the video on Listenonrepeat.com.

How It Works:
	1.	Go to any YouTube video.
	2.	Click the Listen On Repeat button in your Chrome toolbar.
	3.	The video will open on Listenonrepeat.com and start looping instantly!

Join thousands of users who already enjoy uninterrupted playback of their favorite videos. Whether you’re listening to music, watching tutorials, or looping your favorite clips, this extension makes it effortless!

Want more? If you’re looking to download full YouTube playlists or songs directly to Listenonrepeat, try our extension Listenonrepeat: YouTube to LOR at https://go.blastden.com/youtubetolorextension
